questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The image features a character whose surrounding information appears to indicate some form of grading.
no The image includes both the card and its protective casing, which exceeds the dimensions of the card itself.
no The label at the top starts with 'GNARLYXYZ', not 'GNRLYXYZ'.
yes '1/1' is positioned directly below 'GNARLYXYZ' on the label.
yes There is a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'.
yes The grade label "NM-MT" is displayed on the right side at the top of the label.
yes The numeric grade '8' is clearly displayed below the "NM-MT" grade label.
yes The certification number '08247165' is displayed below the numeric grade '8'.
no The text sizes vary, with 'GNARLYXYZ' and 'NM-MT' being larger than '1/1' and the certification number.
no The padding from the border varies; 'GNARLYXYZ' has more space above it compared to other texts.
yes The entire display is set against a plain white background.
no There are multiple elements including a label with text and a barcode on the card.
